title: MIT Data Visualization Assignment 4: Exploring Deceptive Uses of Data
description: Exploration of deceptive uses of data by using persuasive visualizations to make and to disprove the same dishonest position.

title: MIT Data Visualization Assignment 3: Sketching Data
description: Sketching data to perform inital analysis for visualization.

title: MIT Data Visualization Assignment 2: Impacts of Single Family Housing Districts
description: Identifying and visualizing potential impacts from single-family zoning in the Greater Boston Area.

title: Scribble Me This
description: Capstone project from Full Stack Academy. A game in which players compete to get an AI to guess their drawing first given the same prompt. Model was created in ML5 using Google Quickdraw's data set and connects players using Socket.IO.

title: Exploration of Cellular Automata
description: Exploration of Cellular Automata in JavaScript, using React and HTML5. Includes implementations of a 'falling sand' game, Conway's Game of Life, Langton's Ant, and Wolfram's 1-D Cellular Automata.
